fields.name: MissingFieldstxt
fields.fieldText:
Some of the following fields are missing and it is not possible to continue with the survey:

Survey Id{!Get_Task_Data.Survey_ID__c}

Contact Id: {!Get_Task_Data.WhoId}

Account ID: {!Get_Task_Data.AccountId}

Campaign ID: {!Get_Task_Data.WhatId}

Campaign Member ID: {!Get_Task_Data.EBH_CampaignMemberId__c}
